abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column reminisces about his parents and their belongings as family empties and sells apartment after his father's death.
lead_paragraph: Sorting through the things in Dad’s apartment, a son finds meaning in the mundane.

headline.main: A Few Items Speak Volumes About the Life of a Father
headline.print_headline: A Few Items Speak Volumes About the Life of a Father

snippet: Sorting through the things in Dad’s apartment, a son finds meaning in the mundane.
